title: China Evergrande Spillover Risks Can Be Controlled, Central Bank Says
sub_head: Developer had blindly diversified and expanded, official says, but the risk exposure of individual financial institutions to the developer isn’t big
body:
China’s central bank sought to ease concern about potential contagion from China Evergrande Group ’s debt crisis, saying the risk of the developer’s problems spilling over into the financial system was controllable.
Zou Lan, head of financial markets at the People’s Bank of China, on Friday said Evergrande had blindly diversified and expanded, Chinese state media outlets reported. That had led to its operations and finances seriously deteriorating, Mr. Zou said. But he added that the risk exposure of individual financial institutions to the developer isn’t big.
